{{knowledge objective |Identifiant=OIC-260-03-A |Item_parent=Hematuria |Item_parent_short=Hematuria |Rank=A |Title=Diagnosing microscopic haematuria and macroscopic haematuria |Description=None |Rubric=Positive diagnosis |Contributors=Charles Dariane, Bruno Moulin |Order=3}}
*Microscopic haematuria: diagnosis by urine dipstick only (Sn 90%, from ≥ 5 red blood cells/mm3), to be confirmed by ECBU. *Macroscopic haematuria: presence of blood visible to the naked eye (pinkish, red or brownish colouration of the urine, generally from ≥ 500 red blood cells/mm3). Clots or urological symptoms (lower urinary tract symptoms, lumbar or pelvic pain): point to a urological origin. *There is no correlation between the type of haematuria or the amount of bleeding and the severity of the causative disease. '''Microscopic haematuria has the same diagnostic value as macroscopic haematuria.'''

question.title: What is the diagnostic value of microscopic haematuria compared to macroscopic haematuria?
question.description: According to the given text, what is the relationship between microscopic haematuria and macroscopic haematuria?

option_a.title: The amount of bleeding affects the diagnostic value.
option_a.description: This option suggests that the severity of the causative disease is related to the diagnostic value of haematuria.

option_b.title: Microscopic haematuria has a higher diagnostic value than macroscopic haematuria.
option_b.description: This option implies that microscopic haematuria is more sensitive or specific than macroscopic haematuria.

option_c.title: There is no correlation between the type of haematuria and the diagnostic value.
option_c.description: This option states that the type of haematuria (microscopic vs. macroscopic) does not affect the diagnostic value.

option_d.title: Macroscopic haematuria is only diagnosed by urine dipstick.
option_d.description: This option suggests that macroscopic haematuria is only detected by visual inspection of the urine.

correct_option.title: None of the above
correct_option.description: This option indicates that the correct answer is not among the options A, B, or C.
